props.label: WHERE field
props.helpText: Not every field is listed here - only those that look like they are good for filtering. The system selects fields where the number of distinct values in the data is less than 25% of the total rowcount, and the most popular non-null value must represent least 5% of the rowcount

props.maximumChoicesMessage: Please select no more than _max_value_ choices
props.label: Values
staticText 2
props.content:
The Firmstep data dump is not affected by the Firmstep platform's data retention features. In order to remain compliant with GDPR, it is important that personal data is removed from this store when it is no longer required. This feature allows you to specify automated deletion of the data dump data using the same scheduled task that updates the process metadata used by the View Data app.

Note that if you configure overlapping profiles, the strictest will prevail - for example, consider two separate profiles that show the same records to different users. One has a retention of 90 days, the other has retention disabled. The affected data will be removed after 90 days, which may be surprising to users of the second profile.

Set the retention days to zero to disable the feature

props.label: Retention days
props.helpText: When set to a positive number, records that were completed longer than this number of days ago will be deleted by the nightly update.

props.label: retentionmsg
props.defaultValue: if({retention_days}>0,'Any records that match these criteria that have a date completed older than '+dateFormat(({now} + 0-{retention_days} days),'dd MMM yyyy')+' will be removed as part of the nightly metadata scan.','No retention policy in force - no data will be removed')
